UniprotID	Q9NZR4-7
Accession	Q9NZR4;B9EGJ4;D1MF28;Q0GM60;Q0GM61;Q0GM62;Q0GM63;Q0GM64;Q0GM65;Q5TF40;Q5TF41;Q9HCU3;Q9NU27
EntryName	VSX1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Visual system homeobox 1 (Homeodomain protein RINX) (Retinal inner nuclear layer homeobox protein) (Transcription factor VSX1)
GeneName	VSX1 RINX
Length	236
Function	Binds to the 37-bp core of the locus control region (LCR) of the red/green visual pigment gene cluster (PubMed:10903837). May regulate the activity of the LCR and the cone opsin genes at earlier stages of development (PubMed:10903837). Dispensable in early retinal development (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility

Hydropathy
